    Documentation Updates

    Below are recent documentation updates.

    Index of all documentation updates

    If you would like be sent an email whenever this page changes, please see the Setup Automatic Email on Documentation Updates document.

    12-November-2021

    New Docs

    • Title: Fallback HDCP
    • Description: Use HDCP-protected content to block streaming on unauthorized devices, with a standard definition fallback for devices that do not support HDCP.
    • Link: https://apis.support.brightcove.com/playback-restrictions/guides/fallback-hdcp.html
    • Product: Video Cloud
    • Product Area: Playback Restrictions

    Major updates

    • Title: Auto Captions
    • Description: Added new include_transcription_json and transcription_filename fields
    • Link: https://zencoder.support.brightcove.com/encoding-settings/assets/encoding-settings-auto-captions.html
    • Product: Zencoder
    • Product Area: Auto Captions
    • Title: Zencoder API Reference
    • Description: Added new include_transcription_json and transcription_filename fields
    • Link: https://zencoder.support.brightcove.com/references/reference.html
    • Product: Zencoder
    • Product Area: Auto Captions
    • Title: Managing Text Tracks Using the CMS API
    • Description: Added new transcripts kind and new status field
    • Link: https://apis.support.brightcove.com/cms/managing-videos/managing-text-tracks.html
    • Product: Video Cloud
    • Product Area: CMS API, Dynamic Ingest APi, text tracks
    • Title: CMS API Reference
    • Description: Added new transcripts kind and new status field
    • Link: https://apis.support.brightcove.com/cms/references/reference.html
    • Product: Video Cloud
    • Product Area: CMS API, Dynamic Ingest APi, text tracks
    • Title: CMS API Video Fields Reference
    • Description: Added new transcripts kind and new status field
    • Link: https://apis.support.brightcove.com/cms/references/cms-api-video-fields-reference.html
    • Product: Video Cloud
    • Product Area: CMS API, Dynamic Ingest APi, text tracks
    • Title: Ingesting WebVTT Files
    • Description: Added new transcripts kind and new status field
    • Link: https://apis.support.brightcove.com/dynamic-ingest/ingest-guides/ingesting-webvtt-files-text-trackscaptions.html

    • Product Area: CMS API, Dynamic Ingest APi, text tracks

    29-October-2021

    New Docs

    • Title: Dimension: Viewer
    • Description: In this topic, you will learn about the Analytics API viewer dimension. The viewer dimension provides analytics by viewer. Only available if the account has been enabled for viewer analytics.
    • Link: https://apis.support.brightcove.com/analytics/dimension-guides/dimension-viewer.html
    • Product: Video Cloud
    • Product Area: Analytics API
    • Title: Open Measurement for Server-Side Ads (SSAI) and Brightcove Player
    • Description: In this topic, you will learn how to use the iab Open Measurement SDK with Brightcove Player’s Server-Side Ad Insertion (SSAI) plugin.
    • Link: https://player.support.brightcove.com/plugins/open-measurement-with-ssai.html
    • Product: Brightcove Player
    • Product Area: Monetization

    Major updates

    • Title: Installing the Connector for Microsoft Teams

    • Product Area: Integrations, Microsoft Teams Connector
    • Title: Using Live Redundancy
    • Description: Added several notes on the necessity of republishing the player with the new video ID after adding a backup stream and on the best regions to use for the primary and backup streams
    • Link: https://live.support.brightcove.com/live-module/live-redundancy.html
    • Product: Live
    • Product Area: Redundancy
    • Title: Live API Reference

    • Link: https://apis.support.brightcove.com/live-api/references/reference.html#operation/CreateALiveJob

    • Product Area:

    8-October-2021

    New Docs

    • Title: Ingesting Videos with Multi-Language Audio Tracks
    • Description: Language audio tracks in your source videos can be preserved in your Video Cloud video renditions. Ingestion of multi-language audio tracks is supported through the Dynamic Ingest API only,
    • Link: https://apis.support.brightcove.com/dynamic-ingest/ingest-guides/ingesting-videos-multiple-audio-tracks.html
    • Product: Video Cloud
    • Product Area: Dynamic Ingest API, Multiple Audio Tracks
    • Title: Authentication Using OAuth
    • Description: In this topic, you will learn how to configure the integration of Brightcove Beacon with an OIDC provider. Auth0 is used as an example OIDC provider.
    • Link: https://beacon.support.brightcove.com/using-brightcove-beacon/authentication-using-oauth.html
    • Product: Beacon
    • Product Area: Integration, OIDC
